metadata.name: Bobby Jones - Follow Through #1/1
metadata.description:
**Bobby Jones, “Follow Through'”** – Historic photography from the Jones family archives serves as the base for the modern pixel interpretations of the Bobby Jones swing. The beauty and grace of a Bobby Jones follow through, executed with ease and elegance, stands out as one of the all-time images of the game. 

Physical: Pop Art Pixel Series, Mixed Media on Canvas -  28"x36''

Price includes framing and shipping of the physical.
